sn38.8:1.6: “Atthi panavuso, maggo atthi patipada etesam asavanam pahanaya”ti?
sn38.8:1.7: “Atthi kho, avuso, maggo atthi patipada etesam asavanam pahanaya”ti.
sn38.8:1.8: “Katamo panavuso, maggo katama patipada etesam asavanam pahanaya”ti?
sn38.8:1.9: “Ayameva kho, avuso, ariyo atthangiko maggo etesam asavanam pahanaya, seyyathidam—
sn38.8:1.11: Ayam kho, avuso, maggo ayam patipada, etesam asavanam pahanaya”ti.
sn38.8:1.12: “Bhaddako, avuso, maggo bhaddika patipada, etesam asavanam pahanaya.
